maintenance_key3: Taking care of any repairs and maintenance works on campus
maintenance_key4: Procuring all accommodation related stuff for campus needs for dormitories and classrooms
maintenance_key5: Allotment of rooms to new students and reshuffling of rooms after every 45 days
maintenance_key6: Paying the bills for utilities and planning to use them in optimum ways
maintenance_key7: Minintaining hygiene and cleaning schedule for the premises
maintenance_key8: Working on making the campus self-sustainable by starting initiatives like waste management, water recyling and such
